text: Niveaphasma annulata is a species of stick insect found in New Zealand. It is the sole member of the Niveaphasma genus which is unique among stick insects because it can be found living in alpine areas. == Distribution and habitat == N. annulata is restricted to the southern half of the South Island. It is absent from the North Island and has not been observed north of Arthur's Pass. == References == Category:Phasmatidae Category:Monotypic insect genera Category:Phasmatidae of New Zealand
title: Niveaphasma
